name: Restoroute Motel de la Gruyere

reviews.text: We stayed a single night on the way to Italy. Its not all that easy to find lacking a proper postcode but you have a view ranking amongst the best in the world across Lac Gruyere. The rooms were adequate but the bed was very comfortable and the continental breakfast was ok if not inspiring. The restaurant was ridiculously expensive as were many of the shop items. Petrol very expensive in Switzerland - Euro 1.90 at one station.
reviews.title: Spectacular view - good bed - astronomical prices

reviews.text: The room was very spacious and had a lovely balcony. The Gruyere lake view from the balcony was amazing. The small supermarket at the reception area was nice and stored almost everything that we required.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels in Switzerland.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything about this hotel was Superb!
reviews.title: Nice surprise considering that it's just a motel

reviews.text: We've stayed at this motel for 1 night, and can say that it was a rather nice place due the fact that there is a bath and a beautiful view over the lake.
reviews.title: Way to expensive

aka: Restoroute Motel De La Gruyere Avry-Devant-Pont, Switzerland
